name: Kid Icarus: Uprising
synopsis: One of the most beloved franchises in Nintendo’s long history makes its glorious return in spectacular 3D! Pit of Kid Icarus fame is back in a new game designed specifically for the Nintendo 3DS system. Kid Icarus: Uprising is a fast-paced and action-packed blend of aerial and ground-based shooting featuring a huge single-player adventure as well as the option to play with friends locally and online. To keep the experience comfortable and enjoyable for long gaming sessions, you can purchase the AR Cards and the Nintendo 3DS™ Stand pack separately, which were originally bundled with the retail version of Kid Icarus™: Uprising. This offer is available in selected countries.
